summary: Three intersecting stories about people whose lives are affected by the death of a gay restaurateur.
cast: Bill Nighy|Tom Hollander|Douglas Henshall|Clémentine Célarié|Ellie Haddington|Sukie Smith|Josephine Butler|Stuart Laing|Sally Hurst|Dominic Hall|Jim McManus|Howard Gossington|Richard Cant|Hari Dhillon|Peter Symonds|June Barrie|Alasdair Craig|Zoe Shipway|Jessica Lauren Napier|Barney Clark|Will Hunter|David Coffey
title: Corazones desenfrenados
